description.p: KDiff3 is a tool for Comparison and Merge of Files and Directories.

ul.li: Compares or merges two or three text input files or directories
Shows the differences line by line and character by character (!)
Integrated editor for comfortable solving of merge-conflicts
Supports Unicode, UTF-8 and other codecs, autodetection via byte-order-mark 'BOM'
Supports KIO on KDE (allows accessing ftp, sftp, fish, smb etc.)
Automatic merging of version control history ($Log$)
Simplified integration with IBM-Rational-Clearcase for Windows
